|brand = Alice |model = WLAN 4421 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (IAD) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = April 16, 2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Alice_IAD_WLAN_4421 |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router,dsl modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 141750620000J |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Lantiq;PSB 50702;XWAY DANUBE, PSB 50702 E; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24Kec |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 333 <!-- 333 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV640EBTI-70G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Zentel;A3S12D40ETP-G6; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8306G; |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:1C:28 |oui = 00:1C:28
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = brnboot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = ADSL2+, VoIP, FXS |addchip = Ringing SLIC with Integrated DC/DC Converter;Lantiq;PEF 4268;Lantiq, PEF 4268 T, V1.2;2; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = ALICE-WLANXX |defaultssid_regex = ^ALICE-WLAN[0-9]{2}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = ARV7506PW11 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT3060F; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N: 141750620000J R01" is silkscreened on the board. :OEM: [[Arcadyan]] ARV7506PW11
Per the manual, the default SSID appears to be '''ALICE-WLANXX''' where '''XX''' is some number (appears to be non-hex). The OUI used may be (or include) 00:1C:28.
==Links of Interest== *[https://static.dsl.o2online.de/selfcare/content/staticcontentblob/kundencenter/18900410/2012-01-11-20-13-48/data/Handbuch_Alice_WLAN_4421.pdf Manual (DE)] *[https://openwrt.org/toh/arcadyan/arv7506 ''Arcadyan ARV7506PW11'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] Model: [https://oldwiki.archive.openwrt.org/toh/alice/iad4421 Alice IAD WLAN 4421] / [https://oldwiki.archive.openwrt.org/toh/o2/box4421 o2 Box 4421]
